name: Undone (lpriebe)
description:
Play through three short, unfinished games, each with a different interpretation of the same theme. Complete all available stages for a special bonus!

<There's so much left undone... and soon, silence will seep in through the cracks, as it always does. Is there truly no way to protect any of them?>

Made in 9 days for Godot Wild Jam #30, with the theme "heartbeat."
